item.title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to establish a program for the issuance of identity protection personal identification numbers.
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to establish a program for the issuance of identity protection personal identification numbers.

item.latestTitle: To require that the Secretary of the Treasury establish a program for the issuance of identity protection personal identification numbers.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

item.text: This bill requires the Department of the Treasury to establish a program to issue, upon the request of any individual, a number that may be used in connection with a Social Security number (or other identifying information) to assist in verifying the individual's identity. The program must be established within five years of the enactment of this bill.
item.name: Introduced in House

bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 164, Number 56 (Monday, April 9, 2018)]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Mr. PAULSEN:H.R. 5437.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution[Page H3064]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
